text.content: The NotionPresso project currently has several areas that need immediate attention:

text.content:
Multi-language Documentation Needed
Currently, documentation is only available in English and Korean. We need translations in various languages to make the project more accessible to developers worldwide.

text.content: NotionPresso is an open-source project that enables creating personal blogs using Notion as a CMS. It consists of the following packages:

rich_text.plain_text: NotionPresso is an open-source project that enables creating personal blogs using Notion as a CMS. It consists of the following packages:

text.content: : React rendering library for Notion content

rich_text.plain_text: : React rendering library for Notion content

text.content: : CLI tool for extracting Notion data

rich_text.plain_text: : CLI tool for extracting Notion data

text.content: : Svelte rendering library (currently migrating to Svelte 5)

rich_text.plain_text: : Svelte rendering library (currently migrating to Svelte 5)

text.content:
Thank you for contributing! Your participation helps make NotionPresso better. üôè

We especially welcome active participation from those interested in addressing our urgent improvement areas (indentation, legacy references, multi-language support).
